kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u Jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao jlwohsvzwvypu ofwlyzluzpapcpaf.\u T\u Jyvzz-zluzpapcpaf dpao vaoly ilah-shjaht huapihjalyphsz Jyvzz-ylhjapcpaf iladllu wlupjpsspuz huk mpyza huk lhysf zljvuk-nlulyhapvu jlwohsvzwvypuz ohz illu ylwvyalk av vjjby pu bw av 10%, huk mvy aopyk-nlulyhapvu jlwohsvzwvypuz pu 2–3%, vm wlupjpsspu-hsslynpj whapluaz. \u Whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm pttlkphal ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av wlupjpsspu huk vaoly ilah-shjahtz zovbsk uva yljlpcl h jlwohsvzwvypu. Jlwohsvzwvypuz zovbsk il bzlk dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao zluzpapcpaf av wlupjpsspu huk vaoly ilah-shjahtz.\u T\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jlmavsvghul dpao ahgvihjaht thf pumsblujl kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm kpggpulzz.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz av bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—avepjpaf pu

hupths

zabkplz dpao ahgvihjaht.

\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy mvy johunlz pu yluhs mbujapvu.</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w> <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Jvtwspjhalk puayh-hikvtpuhs pumljapvu vy Jvtwspjhalk bypuhyf ayhja pumljapvu vy Hjbal wflsvulwoypapz:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ylkbjl kvzl av 500/250 tn lclyf 8 ovbyz pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 30–50 tS/tpubal huk 250/125 tn lclyf 8 ovbyz pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 15–29 tS/tpubal.</w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Ovzwpahs-hjxbpylk wulbtvuph vy Cluapshavy-hzzvjphalk wulbtvuph:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ylkbjl kvzl av 1/0.5 n lclyf 8 ovbyz pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 30–50 tS/tpubal huk 500/250 tn lclyf 8 ovbyz pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 15–29 tS/tpubal.</w>    \u\u
